plot: For decades, performance artist and writer Kate Bornstein has been exploding binaries and deconstructing gender. And, her own identity. Trans-dyke. Reluctant polyamorist. Sadomasochist. ...
title: Kate Bornstein is a Queer & Pleasant Danger
